data.title: Education Service Centers Map
data.text:
This page provides contact information for the 20 Education Service Centers (ESCs) in Texas. To see a map of counties and districts in each ESC region, use the Texas Education Agency's School District Locator tool. You can also search for ESC staff members statewide using the Texas Education Directory.
